UPDATE.LOG:
x11-toolkits/wlroots: move experimental label to CONSOLEKIT
ConsoleKit2 support uses a patch rejected upstream, and upstream plans to simplify session handling via libseat by dropping other session backends.
(cherry picked from commit ddeb3e2d7f6e69262d65cb84f9b2b75c127b2af0)

COMMIT.Subject: x11-toolkits/wlroots: move experimental label to CONSOLEKIT
